comprehensive_overview: NextDenovo is a software tool designed for de novo transcriptome assembly from RNA-seq data. It leverages de Bruijn graphs and utilizes a hybrid approach combining both OLC (Overlap-Layout-Consensus) and DBG (De Bruijn Graph) strategies to efficiently reconstruct the transcriptome in the absence of a reference genome.
core_features:
1. De novo transcriptome assembly
2. Hybrid approach combining OLC and DBG strategies
3. Utilizes de Bruijn graphs for sequence reconstruction
4. Suitable for RNA-seq data analysis
5. Handles data in the absence of a reference genome
